table.sql: CREATE TABLE cs_member ( me_id bigint NOT NULL, mcat_id bigint DEFAULT '0', me_realname varchar(250) DEFAULT '', me_nickname varchar(250) DEFAULT '', me_card_id varchar(250) DEFAULT '', me_sex int DEFAULT '0', me_vocation varchar(250) DEFAULT '', me_age varchar(250) DEFAULT '', me_address varchar(250) DEFAULT '', me_email varchar(250) DEFAULT '', me_tel varchar(250) DEFAULT '', me_phone varchar(250) DEFAULT '', me_status int DEFAULT '0', app_id varchar(250) DEFAULT '', site_id varchar(250) DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (me_id) )
CREATE TABLE cs_member_category ( mcat_id bigint NOT NULL, mcat_name varchar(250) DEFAULT '', mcat_memo varchar(1000) DEFAULT '', sort_id int DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (mcat_id) )

CREATE TABLE cs_member_config ( config_id bigint NOT NULL, is_allow int DEFAULT '0', is_check int DEFAULT '0', reg_pro ntext , close_pro varchar(1000) DEFAULT '', forbidden_name ntext , PRIMARY KEY (config_id) )

CREATE TABLE cs_member_register ( register_id bigint NOT NULL, me_id bigint DEFAULT '0', me_account varchar(250) DEFAULT '', me_password varchar(250) DEFAULT '', register_type int DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (register_id) )
